questions.question: This arc is centered on a prison fortress in the Calm Belt and features Luffy's attempt to rescue his brother, Portgas D. Ace. What is...?
This arc takes place on an island inhabited by giants and involves a struggle against a corrupt government official. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates arrive on a mysterious island governed by strict time rules and encounter the Foxy Pirates. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to manipulate, produce, and turn into ice. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. What is...?
This power, wielded by one of the Supernovas, allows the user to create and manipulate rooms where they can spatially manipulate anything inside. What is...?
This captain of the Kid Pirates is known for his magnetic powers and rivalry with the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his sand manipulation powers and role as a key antagonist in the Alabasta arc. Who is...?
This character is the leader of the Whitebeard Pirates and was known as the 'Strongest Man in the World'. Who is...?
